value:
To celebrate Fire Emblem's 35th
anniversary, a new 8-Bit Castle
design is ready for you to use!

Take a look!

Having checked out the 8-Bit
Castle design, do you want to
use it?

If you change your mind, tap
Upgrade Castle, then Change
Design, then 8-Bit Castle.
Archive of the West
Hungry Hero

"No eating while walking!" one scolds.
But hunger had set in and taken over.

The hungry one eats it all on the spot.
But chokes! Phew, that was close...

Ever grateful for the reminder, the
hungry one offers the larger piece.

Continuous chomps attract animals.
Till belly and heart are warm and full...
Dragon Legacy

Marth Statue

Fire Emblem: Shadow Dragon or Fire Emblem:
Mystery of the Emblem is your favorite? Then
place this 8-bit statue in your Aether Keep!

SP Aether Stones

Used in Aether Raids to build structures that
are available for a limited time. If that period
has elapsed, these stones will be lost.
